remarks: The predicate "is a division ring".  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
statement:
isdrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isdrng.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
isdrng.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
isdrng $p |- ( R e. DivRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ U = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) ) $.
